Name: Dry Martini (3:1 ratio)
Ingredients: 1 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of chilled Fragata Green Olive on stick or lemon zest twist..
Review: Three to one may be unfair odds in a fight but vermouth shines in this stirred off-dry Martini. Through experimentation we have found that 3:1 Martinis are better stirred rather than shaken. Conversely 15:1 Martinis are better shaken rather than stirred.
History: There is considerable debate around the origin of the Martini and the best way to make this drink. Detailed information can be found on our Dry Martini page.
Nutrition: One serving of Dry Martini (3:1 ratio) contains 155 calories
